info.title: iQIES Survey Service
info.description:
The survey microservice provides survey data gathered by surveyors on health providers of various kinds throughout the country. 
 The surveys are performed for various reasons such as complaints, re-certifications, and more.

parameters.name: isAo
parameters.description: flag to retrieve Ao survey Types

parameters.name: beginDate:
parameters.description: Filter survey having exit date greater or equal to begin date

parameters.name: endDate:
parameters.description: Filter survey having exit date less or equal to end date

parameters.name: excludeFutureSurveys
parameters.description: Future surveys for disallowed users will have most of their data stripped. This flag will remove these future surveys from the results if the UI doesnt require their (limited) info
